comment.author: 82998352@N02
comment._content:
Hi
At Follo Museum, located in Drøbak, Norway, we are planning a laundry exhibition. For this exhibition we are making a magazine about laundry. We want to fill this magazine with art, history, diy projects and all kinds of exciting things connected to laundy to show that it can be a beautiful and exciting theme and not just a drudgery that has to be done.

In connection with this I came across your picture and I am writing this to ask for your permission to use it in the magazine for an article called "Around the world on 80 lines".

Hoping to hear from you soon.

comment.author: 29998366@N02
comment._content:
You are free to use the picture in the size available on Flickr. If you need other sizes please contact verkoop@spaarnestadphoto.nl for permission and sale.
I wish you success with your exhibition!
